sn28.3:1.3: “vippasannani kho te, avuso sariputta, indriyani; parisuddho mukhavanno pariyodato.
sn28.3:2.1: “Idhaham, avuso, pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca vihasim sato ca sampajano sukhanca kayena patisamvedemi; yam tam ariya acikkhanti ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn28.3:2.2: Tassa mayham, avuso, na evam hoti:
sn28.3:2.3: ‘aham tatiyam jhanam samapajjami’ti va ‘aham tatiyam jhanam samapanno’ti va ‘aham tatiya jhana vutthito’ti va”ti.
sn28.3:2.4: Tatha hi panayasmato sariputtassa digharattam ahankaramamankaramananusaya susamuhata.
sn28.3:2.5: Tasma ayasmato sariputtassa na evam hoti:
sn28.3:2.6: “‘aham tatiyam jhanam samapajjami’ti va ‘aham tatiyam jhanam samapanno’ti va ‘aham tatiya jhana vutthito’ti va”ti.
